pubspec.name: simple_gesture_detector
pubspec.description: Easy to use, reliable and lightweight gesture detector for Flutter apps. Exposes simple API to react to basic gestures.
pubspec.author: Aleksander Woźniak <aleksanderwozniak96@gmail.com>
